Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled value in its category. Given its unique features and capabilities, I believe it would greatly benefit your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its worth to us, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $10,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
